content.rendered:
[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1601388025830{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/cyber-awareness-training.jpg?id=11135) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column width=”1/2″ responsive_css=”padding_right_large:0px|padding_right_medium:46px|padding_right_small:35px”]

Cybersecurity Awareness Training

Do your staff know how to reduce the likelihood of data breaches and cyber attacks? Let us help.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”right top” css=”.vc_custom_1597403634575{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 270px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Cyber-Awareness-Training-1.jpg?id=11136) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1601028172460{padding-right: 80px !important;}”]

Cybersecurity Awareness Training

Do your staff know how to reduce the likelihood of data breaches and cyber attacks? We can help.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”0″ bg_position=”right top” css=”.vc_custom_1600441853949{background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/yellow-middle-section.jpg?id=8868) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Left” css=”.vc_custom_1601635449899{margin-top: -230px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” ca_delay=”260″ ca_duration=”3000″ responsive_css=”margin_top_small:-230px|padding_top_small:60px|padding_right_small:50px|padding_bottom_small:20px|padding_left_small:50px”]

What does our awareness training for employees offer?

[vc_row_inner el_class=”square-icons”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Follow up training and testing through a cloud eLearning platform.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Comprehensive training with real-world examples that reduce likelihood of cyber attacks succeeding.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Bring the training to life using real-world stories from our trainers’ own experiences as ethical hackers

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1600864736974{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Cyber-Awareness-Training23.jpg?id=11138) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″ el_id=”detect-information-section” responsive_css=”padding_top_large:90px|padding_bottom_large:70px”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-xs” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″][/vc_column][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ responsive_css=”margin_left_large:15%25|padding_left_large:7%25|margin_left_medium:15%25|padding_right_medium:7%25|padding_left_medium:7%25″ ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”30″ css=”.vc_custom_1600433156945{padding-top: 3% !important;padding-right: 3% !important;padding-bottom: 3% !important;padding-left: 3% !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.82) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}”]

Empowering your staff with cybersecurity knowledge

[vc_column_text]Cybersecurity is not just the job of the IT department. It is something that involves everyone in the organisation. Empowered with the right cybersecurity awareness knowledge, your staff can be your greatest asset, alerting you to threats in real-time as they happen and providing valuable feedback on whether your online security processes and procedures are effective and workable alongside the needs of their job.

With the introduction of GDPR, it’s now necessary to educate your staff on the concepts of cybersecurity across a range of potential attacks and how to correctly handle third parties’ sensitive information.

Unlike most training packages, we use our experience from being ethical hackers to bring the training to life. Using real-world stories from our trainers’ own experiences, we hugely increase staff engagement and promote cultural change within the business.[/vc_column_text]

Did you know our ethical phishing package could help us assess the cybersecurity awareness of your staff and make the training more comprehensive?

Find out more
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_position=”right bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1600938220427{padding-top: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Boxes-e1597915101818.jpg?id=11098) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” responsive_css=”padding_top_large:100px|padding_bottom_large:100px|padding_top_medium:75px|padding_bottom_medium:75px|padding_top_small:50px|padding_bottom_small:50px”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Regulatory compliance

[vc_column_text]A further reason to introduce security awareness training for employees at your organisation is that you may not be compliant with regulations and the law if you don’t. Certain types of organisations such as financial or government institutions and healthcare organisations are required by law to ensure their workforce has received cybersecurity training.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1601904295207{margin-top: 30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;}” responsive_css=”margin_top_large:0px|padding_top_large:30px|padding_right_large:30px|padding_bottom_large:30px|padding_left_large:30px|margin_top_small:60px”][vc_column_text el_class=”o2c-white-text”]Make sure your organisation is compliant with regulations?[/vc_column_text]
Get in touch [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_position=”custom” css=”.vc_custom_1600178937624{border-bottom-width: 20px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: contain !important;}” bg_pos_h=”30px”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

What our cybersecurity awareness training provides

[vc_column_text]

Our live cybersecurity training sessions can be recorded or provided as a webcast to deliver to offices where face-to-face training is not possible. Our awareness training can cover many different topics, delivered through modules no shorter than one hour.

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-xs-6″]

Email phishing and
ransomware

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-xs-6″]

Who may hack
you and why

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-xs-6″]

Social media

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-xs-6″]

Social engineering

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-xs-12″]

Passwords

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

"I need a trusted partner that can provide additional security services into my portfolio."

Managing Director

Enhance your portfolio with our suite of cybersecurity services Find out more

“As a security manager I know the benefit of carrying out simulated cyber attacks on our systems. I need a service provider that can handle my requirements.”

Security Manager

Uncover critical vulnerabilities in your environment Find out more

“I need a supplier that understands the importance of implementing and maintaining Information Security best practices critical to our ongoing success and reputation.”

Managing Director

Get real-time ongoing cyber detection & response Find out more

“My job is to ensure that our business is protected against cyber security attacks. I need a company that can hunt for and eradicate threats.”

CISO

24/7 ongoing monitoring to hunt for and eradicate threats Find out more

“I need a company that can deliver cutting-edge training to my staff, ensuring they are empowered to recognise and defend against cyber security threats.”

Head of Training

Training and advisory services to empower your staff Find out more [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax=”enable_parallax” enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Right” enable_overlay=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1601388039324{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 140px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Testimonials-V2.jpg?id=12953) !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ el_id=”testimonials-MDR” row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-4″]

Testimonials

[/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-9″]

“I have been very impressed by the high standard of Falanx’s communication, testing procedures and reporting. From the initial engagement through to test reports and follow up advice, they have provided exceptional service and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them; we will certainly be using them again for future testing.”

Claudia Zimmer
Operations Manager, Ensign Pensions

“The team at Falanx have been great, from an initial enquiry to completing the test has been seamless. Our account manager and the rest of the team have been incredibly reactive in responding to our queries and the work performed has been great. I would not hesitate to recommend Falanx for your IT Security needs.”

Mitchell Smith
Product Manager, One Site Global Ltd

“We have worked with Falanx Cyber for several years and have always been impressed with the professional service they provide. This begins with the early stages of planning, providing useful advice on which areas to focus testing on, including any specific details around emerging threats. This continues with the execution of the agreed pen tests and vulnerability assessments where we are kept informed throughout the whole process, and finally with the informative reports produced and any assistance required following any remediation efforts.”

James Myhill
Head of IT, Canal and River Trust

“Falanx provided us with a phishing campaign that delivered a invaluable insight into how our staff reacted to potentially dangerous phishing attempts. The Phishing results were very  enlightening and will help shape our internal cyber security awareness program. We were very pleased with the design and execution of the campaign and we will continue to use Falanx for further phishing campaigns to prove the effectiveness of our cyber security training”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“Falanx conducted in-person training session that made employees engage, participate, and ask questions. Rob the trainer showed us that human recognition is one of the most important lines of defence against phishing and cyber security attacks. We especially enjoyed Rob’s stories of social engineering and made all employees sit up and think how important all aspects of cyber security not just attacks via conventional means.”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“We see great value in investing in positive reinforcement of staff, especially in delivering awareness training. Due to COVID-19 on site training was not possible but Falanx were able to step in and provide their usual high quality cyber security training over web.”

Cyber Security Manager
Leading Specialist Bank
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
